data.Name: Makari
data.Bio: Makari is an alternative/progressive rock band from South Florida. Discography: 2011 - The Escape (EP)2013 - Makari / Knives, Knives, Knives (Single)2013 - See Dreams (EP)2015 - Ghost Stories (EP)2016 - Elegies (EP)2018 - Hyperreal2020 - Alternate (EP) Current members: Andy Cizek - Vocals (since 2017)Eric Stewart - GuitarMatt Beljan - GuitarJohn Tomasso - BassKevin Beljan - Drums Past members: Spencer Pearson - Vocals (2016-2017)Brandon Sky Cullen - Vocals (2011-2016)Lindsay England - Piano/Keys (2011-2015) Facebook | Bandcamp | YouTube Read more on Last.fm
